findings.description: This is a legitimate CORS misconfiguration where the WordPress REST API allows arbitrary origins with credentials, enabling cross-site data theft from authenticated users.
findings.exploitation_steps: Host a malicious webpage that makes authenticated requests to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 from a victim's browser, allowing extraction of sensitive page data if the user is logged into Plex's WordPress site.
